original_solution_mapping.L1: Ten years from now, the elder child will be 20+10 = <<10+20=30>>30 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L2: If the elder child is 20 years old now, the second born is 20-5 = <<20-5=15>>15 years old, 5 years younger than the firstborn.
original_solution_mapping.L3: The second-born will be 15+10 = 25 years old ten years from now.
original_solution_mapping.L4: The total age of the first and second-born 10 years from now will be 25+30 = <<25+30=55>>55
original_solution_mapping.L5: The third-born who is five years younger than the second born is 15-5 = <<15-5=10>>10 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L6: The third sibling's age ten years from now will be 10+10 = <<10+10=20>>20 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L7: The total age of the three siblings ten years from now will be 55+20 = <<55+20=75>>75 years.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5111.
    Returns: the total of the ages of the three siblings 10 years from now.
    """
    # L1
    elder_child_current_age = 20 # eldest child is 20 years old now
    years_from_now = 10 # 10 years from now
    elder_child_age_future = elder_child_current_age + years_from_now

    # L2
    age_difference = 5 # born 5 years apart
    second_born_current_age = elder_child_current_age - age_difference

    # L3
    second_born_age_future = second_born_current_age + years_from_now

    # L4
    total_age_first_two_future = second_born_age_future + elder_child_age_future

    # L5
    third_born_current_age = second_born_current_age - age_difference

    # L6
    third_born_age_future = third_born_current_age + years_from_now

    # L7
    total_age_three_siblings_future = total_age_first_two_future + third_born_age_future

    # FA
    answer = total_age_three_siblings_future
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Ten years from now, the elder child will be {elder_child_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{years_from_now}+{elder_child_current_age}={elder_child_age_future}>>{elder_child_age_future} years old.

If the elder child is {elder_child_current_age} years old now, the second born is {elder_child_current_age}-{age_difference} = <<{elder_child_current_age}-{age_difference}={second_born_current_age}>>{second_born_current_age} years old, {age_difference} years younger than the firstborn.
The second-born will be {second_born_current_age}+{years_from_now} = {second_born_age_future} years old ten years from now.

The total age of the first and second-born 10 years from now will be {second_born_age_future}+{elder_child_age_future} = <<{second_born_age_future}+{elder_child_age_future}={total_age_first_two_future}>>{total_age_first_two_future}

The third-born who is five years younger than the second born is {second_born_current_age}-{age_difference} = <<{second_born_current_age}-{age_difference}={third_born_current_age}>>{third_born_current_age} years old.
The third sibling's age ten years from now will be {third_born_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{third_born_current_age}+{years_from_now}={third_born_age_future}>>{third_born_age_future} years old.

The total age of the three siblings ten years from now will be {total_age_first_two_future}+{third_born_age_future} = <<{total_age_first_two_future}+{third_born_age_future}={total_age_three_siblings_future}>>{total_age_three_siblings_future} years.
